verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] offering Alaska a workaround to a regulatory exemption the courts would not allow for Tongass National Forest .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: offering] [ARG3: Alaska] [ARG1: a workaround to a regulatory exemption the courts would not allow for Tongass National Forest] .
The Trump administration is offering Alaska a workaround to a regulatory exemption the courts [V: would] not allow for Tongass National Forest .
The Trump administration is offering Alaska a workaround to [ARG1: a regulatory exemption] [ARG0: the courts] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: allow] [ARGM-PNC: for Tongass National Forest] .
